Subjects: Thomas of Canterbury, saint; hymns, to saints
_description: ‘Antiphona de sancto Thoma Martyre’ — five couplets

OxfJesus29.First Lines: Haly thomas of heouericheAlle apostles eueliche…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…þu ert froure a mong mon kunnehelp vs nv of vre sunne
                    Amen
